item.title: XXVIII Reunió Anual Societat Catalana de Neurologia
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Neus Falgàs, Beatriz Bosch, Uma Maria Lal-Trehan Estrada, Núria Guillén, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Roser Sala-Llonch, Raquel Sánchez-Valle TITLE: Asimetria cortical en individus en risc de patir malaltia d’Alzheimer CONFERENCE: XXVIII Reunió Anual Societat Catalana de Neurologia PLACE: Barcelona, Spain DATES: May 8 - 10, 2024

item.title: Down Syndrome associated Alzheimer disease (DSAD) and autosomal dominant AD (ADAD)
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Neus Falgàs, Beatriz Bosch, Uma Maria Lal-Trehan Estrada, Núria Guillén, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Roser Sala-Llonch, Raquel Sánchez-Valle TITLE: Cortical Asymmetry in individuals with Autosomal Dominant Alzheimer’s Disease CONFERENCE: Down Syndrome associated Alzheimer disease (DSAD) and autosomal dominant AD (ADAD) PLACE: Barcelona, Spain DATES: April 11 - 12, 2024

item.title: VII Jornadas científicas de estudiantes de la SEB
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Uma Maria Lal-Trehan Estrada, Neus Falgàs, Núria Guillén, Sergi Borrego-Écija, Beatriz Bosch, Jordi Juncà-Parella, Adrià Tort-Merino, Jordi Sarto, Josep Maria Augé, Anna Antonell, Núria Bargalló, Raquel Ruiz-García, Laura Naranjo, Mireca Balasa, Albert Lladó, Roser Sala Llonch, Raquel Sánchez-Valle TITLE: The Cortical Asymmetry Index (CAI) for subtyping frontotemporal dementia and Alzheimer’s disease patients CONFERENCE: VII Jornadas científicas de estudiantes de la SEB PLACE: Varcelona, Spain DATES: February 7 - 9, 2024
